headline: BlackRock® Canada Calls Unitholder Meeting of iShares Premium Money Market ETF to Approve Investment Objective Change
summary: TORONTO, Nov. 08, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- BlackRock Asset Management Canada Limited (“BlackRock Canada”), an indirect, wholly-owned subsidiary of BlackRock, Inc. (“BlackRock”) (NYSE: BLK) today announced that it has called a special meeting of unitholders (the “Meeting”) of the iShares Premium Money Market ETF (the “iShares Fund”), to be held on or about January 22, 2025 to approve a change to the investment objective of the iShares Fund to permit investments in asset-backed commercial paper (t

headline: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Has More Assets Than Its Gold ETF—Which Is Almost 20 Years Old
summary: iShares' bitcoin ETF assets jumped this week amid a bitcoin rally and investor inflows after a decisive election victory for former president Donald Trump.

headline: BlackRock Mulls Over Buying Minority Stake in Millennium Management
summary: BLK is considering buying a minority stake in Millennium Management. This move aligns with its aim to expand into a lucrative alternative asset business.

headline: BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF Achieves Record $1.1 Billion in Single-Day Inflows
summary: BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) has set a new benchmark with over $1.1 billion in net inflows recorded on Thursday, marking the highest single-day inflows for the fund.

headline: BlackRock in talks about a strategic tie-up with Millennium - sources
summary: BlackRock Inc is in early-stage talks with hedge fund Millennium Management about a strategic tie-up that could involve acquiring a minority stake in the hedge fund, two sources familiar with the matter said. The sources said it was not clear whether the talks would result in a deal, with one of them saying the strategic rationale of a transaction was not clear. The Financial Times reported earlier on the deal talks.
